channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Multiple craters/mine shafts on Leckhampton road, 28th January
item.description:
Absolutely shocking state of the road on Leckhampton Road, near Moorend Road. Huge very deep craters that are a danger to motor vehicles and bicycles. The road needs resurfacing not just more poor repair jobs. Please fix asap.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 138, Leckhampton Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 28th January
item.description:
X1 DAMAGED POST leaning in to footway needs replacing made safe on a nwd with temporary barriers
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees)

item.title: Abandoned roadwork sign with easel and weight, 28th January
item.description:
Against brick wall on left immediately after the A46 traffic lights, opposite the retirement flats. The three items are often moved by pranksters and left across the pavement in such a way as to be an impediment to pedestrians. The items have been there for the last three weeks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Suffolk Square, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large deep pothole, has been "filled" multiple times over the last 5 years and repeatedly comes back, 28th January
item.description:
Middle of the road and always has a car parked next to it, you either have to hit it or mount the pavement to avoid
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Street, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree next to the road outside 55 Ermin park on footpath splitting down the trunk. Looks about to fall at anytime. Already had some large branches fall before., 28th January
item.description:
